FuncDef:
The isis purge-lsp auto-protect disable command disables IS-IS purge LSPs from triggering master/slave main control board switchovers.
The undo isis purge-lsp auto-protect disable command restores the default configuration. The isis purge-lsp auto-protect disable command disables IS-IS purge LSPs from triggering master/slave main control board switchovers. The undo isis purge-lsp auto-protect disable command restores the default configuration. By default, IS-IS purge LSPs trigger master/slave main control board switchovers.
